definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: magic art, or perh. magic drug (Aram. h.re4 practise magic, [[חָרָשׁ]], h.aro4o0 magician, h.er4o0 incantation, magic art, preparation of magic potion, so Eth. h.arise: one using incantations; h.aras: h.ars: h.ar4s: incantation, magic; comp. perh. Ar. xursun, xursah;un a medicinal broth given to women in childbed; [[חֶרֶשׁ]] perh. magical drug, v. RS:JPh xiv. 1885, 125)—only [[חֲכַם]] [[חֲרָשִׁים]] Is 3:3 skilled in magic arts, or drugs (‖[[נְבוֹן לָָחַשׁ]]), ( > others gen. = handicraft).
